pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X verze Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
